Package org.parboiled.annotations

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    BuildParseTree
    Build a parse tree
    Cached
    Build a cache for Rules having arguments
    DontExtend
    Do not generate a wrapper method for this rule
    DontLabel
    Do not generate a label for this rule, or parser
    DontSkipActionsInPredicates
    Override SkipActionsInPredicates for one particular rule
    ExplicitActionsOnly
    Don't wrap boolean expressions into Actions
    Label
    Apply a custom label to a Rule
    MemoMismatches
    Record mismatches for a particular rule
    SkipActionsInPredicates
    Do not run actions in "predicate" rules (Test and TestNot)
    SkipNode
    Do not create a parse tree node for this rule
    SuppressNode
    Do not create parse tree nodes for this rule and all its children
    SuppressSubnodes
    Do not create parse nodes for all children of this rule
